dt-type.description:
A string is simply a sequence of characters. A string is created using the syntax `""` or `''` in Javascript.

A detailed description of the `String` type is available on the [Mozilla Developer Network](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String).


## Use in DataTables

Where a parameter is shown as accepting a string type, or a method returning a string type, it indicates that a `string` is expected / returned.
dt-type.name: string
